metadata.name: 1E V GREATNESS
metadata.description:
Greatness is a high energy song, centred around the theme of Greatness and taking a loss but bouncing straight back to bigger and better things, featuring vocals from 1E Yuri, 1E Zuko and 1E Kakashi on a Kadybeatz production. Kadybeatz is a top tier producer in the Web3 space and specialises in the Drill sound.

Greatness also features an Artwork created by the legend Artchi and his iconic anime style illustrations.

Holding this piece gives you access to the raw creative material for the track and artwork, this will also unlock benefits for future drops.
